main_definition: A cheque is a written order directing a bank to pay money from an individual's account to another person or organization.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Bank draft, a type of negotiable instrument representing payment
meanings_and_examples.example: When I bought the car, I received a cheque as part of my settlement.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A written order to withdraw money from an account
meanings_and_examples.example: I wrote a cheque for $100 to pay for groceries.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An outdated form of payment, less common now in favor of electronic transactions
meanings_and_examples.example: My grandfather used to write cheques instead of using online banking services.
